{{disambig-more|Fastred|[[Fastred (disambiguation)]]}} {{infobox character | people=[[Hobbits|Hobbit]] | name=Fastred of Greenholm | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position=[[Warden of Westmarch]] | location=[[Greenholm]], [[Westmarch]]
[[Undertowers]] | affiliation= | language= | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Fairbairn Family|Fairbairn]] | parentage= | siblings= | spouse=[[Elanor Gardner]] | children=[[Elfstan Fairbairn|Elfstan]] and [[Fíriel Fairbairn|Fíriel]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Fastred of [[Greenholm]]''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Fastred married [[Elanor Gardner]] in {{FoA|30}} on the [[Far Downs]]. Together they had a son, [[Elfstan Fairbairn|Elfstan]],{{App|Later}} and a daughter [[Fíriel Fairbairn|Fíriel]].{{AB|Preface}}, note 2 He was made [[Warden of Westmarch]] in {{SR|1462}} by [[Thain]] [[Peregrin Took]], and he relocated to the [[Undertowers]] with his family. ==Etymology== ''Fastred'' in [[Old English]] means "fast-rede, firm-counsel".[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names" {{references}} [[Category:Hobbits]] [[Category:Fairbairn]] [[Category:Fourth Age characters]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[de:Fastred von Grünholm]] [[fi:Fastred (hobitti)]]
